rules.name: myRule_5
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16) AND 17
rules.label: Send Separation Notice & Update w F1

rules.name: myRule_8
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND (3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16) AND 17
rules.label: Send Separation Notice & Update w /oF1

Flow.description: HR Send Separation Notice - part of 700 filing

value.stringValue: ISNEW() && ( ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A01-CEA appointment from list') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A01-Limited Term from List') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A01-Permanent Appointment from List') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A01-TAU in Lieu of Limited Term') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A01-TAU in Lieu of Permanent Appointment') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A02-Emergency') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A02-Reinstatement (permissive)') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A02-Retired Annuitant') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A02-Transfer') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A03-Reinstatement (mandatory)') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A04-Training & Development') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A11-Involuntary Reassignment') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A14 - Adverse Demotion') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A20-Reallocation') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A30/A31-Exempt') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A22-In Lieu of Appt through Cert Process') )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_1
formulas.expression: ISNEW() && ( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A01-CEA appointment from list') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A01-Limited Term from List') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A01-Permanent Appointment from List') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A01-TAU in Lieu of Limited Term') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A01-TAU in Lieu of Permanent Appointment') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A02-Emergency') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A02-Reinstatement (permissive)') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A02-Retired Annuitant') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A02-Transfer') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A03-Reinstatement (mandatory)') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A04-Training & Development') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A11-Involuntary Reassignment') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A14 - Adverse Demotion') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A20-Reallocation') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A30/A31-Exempt') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A22-In Lieu of Appt through Cert Process') )

value.stringValue: ISCHANGED([Appointment__c].Type__c) && ( ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A01-CEA appointment from list') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A01-Limited Term from List') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A01-Permanent Appointment from List') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A01-TAU in Lieu of Limited Term') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A01-TAU in Lieu of Permanent Appointment') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A02-Emergency') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A02-Reinstatement (permissive)') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A02-Retired Annuitant') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A02-Transfer') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A03-Reinstatement (mandatory)') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A04-Training & Development') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A11-Involuntary Reassignment') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A14 - Adverse Demotion') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A20-Reallocation') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A30/A31-Exempt') || ISPICKVAL([Appointment__c].Type__c , 'A22-In Lieu of Appt through Cert Process') )

formulas.name: formula_myRule_3
formulas.expression: ISCHANGED({!myVariable_current.Type__c}) && ( ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A01-CEA appointment from list') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A01-Limited Term from List') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A01-Permanent Appointment from List') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A01-TAU in Lieu of Limited Term') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A01-TAU in Lieu of Permanent Appointment') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A02-Emergency') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A02-Reinstatement (permissive)') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A02-Retired Annuitant') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A02-Transfer') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A03-Reinstatement (mandatory)') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A04-Training & Development') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A11-Involuntary Reassignment') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A14 - Adverse Demotion') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A20-Reallocation') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A30/A31-Exempt') || ISPICKVAL({!myVariable_current.Type__c} , 'A22-In Lieu of Appt through Cert Process') )
